Armada/Blizzard/Kamodia



(Armada made a weird face. Wondering if that was=
 really Airbomber. She leaves her commlink on in case FZ calls. She growls.=
)


Armada: I don't understand the controls on this ship. We're going to be=
 here all day.


(The 3 stare at the controls.)

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday=
, March 18, 2001 6:40 PM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


  Airbomber:=
 Bye, bye, Infectra.

  Airbomber disconnected.

  Arrow: Now what do you p=
lan to do? You and your brother are welcome with the Maximals.

  Airbomber=
: Time Warp, do you want to stay here?

  Stranato: Yeah, come on, we're ni=
ce guys.

  Train Wreck: And I need to talk to you in private, Airbomber.

=
  Arrow: Infectra was scum, you are one of us.

  Airbomber: Take that back=
!

  Arrow: No.

  Airbomber; I'll kill you!

  Train Wreck steps in front =
of Airbomber. He moves his mouth to the words "not now."
    ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sen=
t: Sunday, March 18, 2001 5:36 PM
    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


 =
   (OOC: Hey Yanshosh, do the shuttles fly automatically? If not, how are t=
hey supposed to fly them?)

     
    Armada/Blizzard/Kamodia



    (Blizz=
ard walks into the shuttle with Kamodia and Armada.)


    Armada: The Maxi=
mals? I hate them. I got to sit around and do nothing there. Right now I'm =
sitting in a shuttle with 2 other bots. I'm being sent out to collect DNA s=
amples. At the Maximal base, they make you guard stuff thats already escape=
d or destroyed and they leave you to die. I had to do something. I couldn't=
 live like that. It sucked.


    (Armada says back to Airbomber.)

      -=
---- Original Message ----- 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 5:03 PM
      Subject: =
Re: Big Post(with fries)


      Airbomber looked to Arrow. Arrow was smili=
ng.

      AIrbomber: Alliance base? But what about the Maximals!?...
     =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:39 PM
        Subj=
ect: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        Armada



        Armada: I'm in th=
e Alliance base.


        (Armada says back to Airbomber.)

          ----=
- Original Message ----- 
          From: Soulstice Omega 
          To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 PM
      =
    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


          Airbomber: I'm in the Max=
imal base, Infectra. Where are you?...
            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
           Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:08 AM
            Subject: Re: Bi=
g Post(with fries)


            Armada


            Armada: Baby? That do=
esn't sound like you..But, anyway, where are you?

              ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
              From: Soulstice Omega 
              To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:01 AM
=
              Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


              Airbomber: =
I'm here with Time Warp, come on baby, you know it's me! I'm black and whit=
e, I change into a cheetah, well I used to, but I like my robot mode, and I=
 got inhaled by that guy, remember?...
                ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
                From: *Orchid* 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
                Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 AM
           =
     Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                Armada



        =
        Armada: Airbomber? How can I be sure that's you?


                =
(Armada awaits an answer.)
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                  From: Soulstice Omega 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
                  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:32 AM
        =
          Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                  Arrow puts =
Airbomber on.

                  Airbomber: Infectra? Is that you really?..=
.
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    Fro=
m: *Orchid* 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              =
      Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
                    Subject: Re:=
 Big Post(with fries)


                    Armada



                    A=
rmada: Airbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...


 =
                   (Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

 =
                     ----- Original Message ----- 
                      Fr=
om: Soulstice Omega 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    =
                  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
                    =
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                      Arrow: Hera tha=
t, Airbomber? She USED to be Infectra!

                      Airbomber: Yo=
u can't fool me, you just got someone who sounds just like her to pose as h=
er...LET ME TALK TO HER!

                      Arrow: Airbomber wants to t=
alk to you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
                        ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
                        From: *Orchid* 
                =
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Sunday, M=
arch 18, 2001 3:10 AM
                        Subject: Re: Big Post(with fr=
ies)


                        Armada



                        (Armada li=
stens to the voice coming over her commlink.)


                        Arm=
ada: Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada now. Who is th=
is?


                        (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an =
answer from Arrow.)

                          ----- Original Message -----=
 
                          From: Soulstice Omega 
                        =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                          Sent: Saturday, Mar=
ch 17, 2001 10:19 PM
                          Subject: Re: Big Post(with f=
ries)


                          Airbomber: But where do we go?

         =
                 Arrow: That's up to you, Airbomber, but I wouldn't lie to =
you.

                          Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie to you,=
 but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

                          Strana=
to: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

                          Airbomber=
: But how can that be?

                          Arrow: Call her.

       =
                   Airbomber: I tried that.

                          Arro=
w: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call her.

          =
                Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

                          =
Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...

                          =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                            From: Alloran2@=
aol.com 
                            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          =
                  Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
                  =
          Subject: Big Post(with fries)


                            OOC: =
Please add the new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
      =
                      Syria. 

                            :::Ramjet/Wheelj=
ack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

                            Ramjet: The one extre=
mely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
                  =
          by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the=
 Maximals 
                            and Alliance.  The other one is the =
Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
                            of Pre=
dacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
    =
                        be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
       =
                     ~~~~~ 
                            Wheeljack: I'd say =
a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
                 =
           ~~~~~ 
                            Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we=
 should first go to the Maximals, for they will 
                          =
  be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
  =
                          Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
            =
                ::he walks out of his cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
 =
                           ~~~~~ 
                            ::Time Warp w=
as releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
             =
               said about Infectra:: 
                            Time Warp=
: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
       =
                     definately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of h=
ere Airbomber, these 
                            guys are fools.
